message.name: ERR_ID_MUST_NOT_CONTAIN_SPACES
message.locale: The %1s field containing "%2s" represents an identifier and therefore must not contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_IMAGE_MUST_NOT_CONTAIN_SPACES
message.locale: The field containing "%1s" represents an image and therefore must not contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_ID_MUST_NOT_BEGIN_WITH_NUMBER
message.locale: The %1s field containing "%2s" represents an identifier and therefore must not begin with a number.

message.name: ERR_ID_MUST_NOT_CONTAIN_COLON
message.locale: The %1s field containing "%2s" represents an identifier and therefore must not contain the colon(:) character.
